title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 96.13 - Notification of change of address or employment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 96.13 - Notification of change of address or employment

State Regulations
A duly licensed and currently registered nursing home administrator shall notify the Board of any change of their title, place of employment, home and e-mail address or primary telephone number within 10 days of such change. Notes

York State Register June 28, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 26, eff. 6/28/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
